132.title: Adventures of Hatim
132.description: Hatim, a young prince goes from a regular, uneventful life to becoming a force that saves the world from the evil Zargham.

9580.title: Shaka Laka Boom Boom
9580.description: Sanju finds a magical pencil, which has the power to bring anything he draws to life. While Fun at first, the pencil opens more mystical adventures.

1000013702.title: Ferrari Ki Sawaari
1000013702.description: To fulfil the dream of watching his son play at Lord's stadium, Rusy is willing to go to any extent, even if it means stealing Sachin Tendulkar's Ferrari.

1000058496.title: Saivam
1000058496.description: Kathiresan's family decides to sacrifice a rooster to evade bad luck. However, the rooster disappears, ensuing chaos and panic.

1000070417.title: Sisindri
1000070417.description: A plan to make quick money by abducting a rich baby goes astray when the kid turns out to be smarter than his kidnappers.

1000102128.title: My Friend Ganesha 3
1000102128.description: Ganya, an orphan, is troubled by his evil uncle and aunt for the property that he has inherited from his family. Who will come to his rescue?

1000182054.title: Hanuman Da’Damdaar
1000182054.description: To prove that he is a brave boy, Maruti, a young boy sets out on a jungle adventure and transforms into India's original superhero, Hanuman.

1000192003.title: Little Krishna II - The Legendary Warrior
1000192003.description: It is about Lord Krishna’s fight against his evil uncle Kansa.

1000192025.title: Little Krishna - The Darling of Vrindavan
1000192025.description: Follow the story of Lord Krishna's birth and his naughty childhood adventures in Vrindavan.

1000192026.title: Little Krishna III - The Wondrous Feats
1000192026.description: The story of Lord Krishna fighting dangerous demons like Aghasura, dreadful Vatsasura, and wicked Vyomasura.

1000216197.title: Bal Ganesh 3
1000216197.description: A group of alien kids visits Earth to find out more about Bal Ganesh. They meet three mice, Dhoti, Topi and Suit Boot, who share Bal Ganesh's adventurous tales.

1000229141.title: Hanuman Vs Mahiravana
1000229141.description: The story of Hanuman saving Rama and Lakshmana from Mahiravana, Ravana's brother, and a dark and powerful sorcerer.

1260003658.title: Thakumar Jhuli
1260003658.description: Explore the world of fantasy through the stories from Thakumar Jhuli, a collection of Bengali folk tales and fairy tales.

1260016958.title: Simple Samosa
1260016958.description: Samosa, a vibrant and energetic hero, exaggerates his heroic tales sometimes, but he’ll always step up to remedy the situation, and help save the day!

1260020929.title: Shin-chan
1260020929.description: Shin-chan follows the journey of five-year-old, Shinnosuke "Shin" Nohara and his family, his pet dog Shiro, neighbours, and friends in Kasukabe, Japan.

1260021004.title: Doraemon
1260021004.description: Trouble seems to follow Nobita around. Fortunately for him, he’s got Doraemon, a trusty cat-type robot from the 22nd century.

1260024619.title: Selfie with Bajrangi
1260024619.description: Ankush's life changes when he meets a mysterious nine-year-old child named Bajrangi, who is visible to nobody but him. Together, they learn the importance of togetherness, friendship, and trust.

1260043394.title: Chacha Bhatija
1260043394.description: Chacha and Bhatija, the uncle-nephew duo ‘world-famous’ in Funtoosh Nagar, solve complicated problems in their uncanny and funny ways.

1260052718.title: Pixar Popcorn
1260052718.description: Grab a quick snack of Pixar with this collection of mini shorts starring your favorite characters.

1260066788.title: Best of Luck Nikki
1260066788.description: Dolly creates a video diary about their family and friends containing advice for Nikki when she grows up.
